description: A build script for a DTCP component in a software project, defining environment setup, build, clean, configure, and install functions with project-specific variables and options.

methods.name: configure
methods.description: Performs any pre-build configuration, currently a placeholder.

methods.name: clean
methods.description: Executes the clean step by calling a build script.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Performs the build, copies binaries to the filesystem root.

methods.name: rebuild
methods.description: Performs a clean followed by a build.

methods.name: install
methods.description: Installs the built binaries into the filesystem root.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays help information for the script command line options.
